comment._content:
Here's the SRNSW version [http://www.flickr.com/photos/state-records-nsw/11229025424/in/photostream/]

A good number of these chaps appear to be NSW Public Works Dept engineers. Some of the more senior engineers turn up in many of the Harbour Bridge pics...

We see quite a few of these chaps here as well 

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/8282694749/]
